name: Ensure 100% Accurate Verification
detail: Confirm the accuracy of every background check with our precise verification system.

name: Secure Document Storage
detail: Safely store and manage all verification documents with enhanced security measures.

name: Real-Time Status Tracking for Agents
detail: Monitor the progress of background checks with real-time status updates for agents.

name: Real-Time Status Tracking for Head Agents
detail: Keep track of all ongoing verifications with detailed status updates for head agents.

name: Real-Time Status Tracking for Verifiers
detail: Ensure verifiers have up-to-date information on the status of background checks.

name: Comprehensive Verification Dashboard
detail: Access an all-in-one dashboard to manage and review verification processes efficiently.
